committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize the President to proclaim the week of June 29 through July 5 as "Why I Love America Week".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the week of June 29 through July 5 of each year as "Why I Love America Week."

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize the President to proclaim the week of June 29 through July 5 as "Why I Love America Week".
